knora-api:Annotation.rdfs:comment: A generic class for representing annotations
knora-api:Annotation.rdfs:label: Annotation

knora-api:AudioRepresentation.rdfs:comment: Represents a file containing audio data
knora-api:AudioRepresentation.rdfs:label: Representation (Audio)

knora-api:ColorValue.rdfs:comment: Represents a color in HTML format, e.g. "#33eeff"

knora-api:DDDFileValue.rdfs:comment: This represents some 3D-object with mesh data, point cloud, etc.

knora-api:ForbiddenResource.rdfs:comment: A ForbiddenResource is a proxy for a resource that the client has insufficient permissions to see.
knora-api:ForbiddenResource.rdfs:label: A ForbiddenResource is a proxy for a resource that the client has insufficient permissions to see.

knora-api:GeomValue.rdfs:comment: Represents a geometrical objects as JSON string

knora-api:IntervalValue.rdfs:comment: Represents a time interval, e.g. in an audio recording

knora-api:LinkValue.rdfs:comment: A reification node that describes direct links between resources

knora-api:ListNode.rdfs:comment: Represents a flat or hierarchical list

knora-api:MovingImageRepresentation.rdfs:comment: A resource containing moving image data
knora-api:MovingImageRepresentation.rdfs:label: Representation (Movie)

knora-api:Region.rdfs:comment: Represents a geometric region of a resource. The geometry is represented currently as JSON string.
knora-api:Region.rdfs:label: Region

knora-api:Representation.rdfs:comment: A resource that can store one or more files
knora-api:Representation.rdfs:label: Representation

knora-api:Resource.rdfs:comment: Represents something in the world, or an abstract thing
knora-api:Resource.rdfs:label: Resource

knora-api:StandoffBooleanTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a boolean in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffColorTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a color in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffDataTypeTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a knora-base value type in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffDateTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a date in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffDecimalTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a decimal (floating point) value in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffIntegerTag.rdfs:comment: Represents an integer value in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffInternalReferenceTag.rdfs:comment: Represents an internal reference in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffIntervalTag.rdfs:comment: Represents an interval in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffLinkTag.rdfs:comment: Represents a reference to a Knora resource in a TextValue

knora-api:StandoffUriTag.rdfs:comment: Represents an arbitrary URI in a TextValue

knora-api:StillImageFileValue.rdfs:comment: A file containing a two-dimensional still image

knora-api:StillImageRepresentation.rdfs:comment: A resource that can contain two-dimensional still image files
knora-api:StillImageRepresentation.rdfs:label: Representation (Image)

knora-api:TextFileValue.rdfs:comment: A text file such as plain Unicode text, LaTeX, TEI/XML, etc.

knora-api:Value.rdfs:comment: The base class of classes representing Knora values

knora-api:knoraProject.rdfs:comment: Represents a project that uses Knora

knora-api:audioFileValueHasDuration.rdfs:comment: The duration of an audio file value.
knora-api:audioFileValueHasDuration.rdfs:label: Audio file value has duration

knora-api:booleanValueAsBoolean.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal boolean value of a BooleanValue.
knora-api:booleanValueAsBoolean.rdfs:label: Boolean value as decimal

knora-api:canBeInstantiated.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether a resource class can be instantiated via the Knora API.
knora-api:canBeInstantiated.rdfs:label: can be instantiated

knora-api:colorValueAsColor.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal RGB value of a ColorValue.
knora-api:colorValueAsColor.rdfs:label: Color value as color

knora-api:creationDate.rdfs:comment: Indicates when a resource was created

knora-api:dateValueHasCalendar.rdfs:comment: Represents the calendar of a date value.
knora-api:dateValueHasCalendar.rdfs:label: Date value has calendar

knora-api:dateValueHasEndDay.rdfs:comment: Represents the end day of a date value.
knora-api:dateValueHasEndDay.rdfs:label: Date value has end day

knora-api:dateValueHasEndEra.rdfs:comment: Represents the end era of a date value.
knora-api:dateValueHasEndEra.rdfs:label: Date value has end era

knora-api:dateValueHasEndMonth.rdfs:comment: Represents the end month of a date value.
knora-api:dateValueHasEndMonth.rdfs:label: Date value has end month

knora-api:dateValueHasEndYear.rdfs:comment: Represents the end year of a date value.
knora-api:dateValueHasEndYear.rdfs:label: Date value has end year

knora-api:dateValueHasStartDay.rdfs:comment: Represents the start day of a date value.
knora-api:dateValueHasStartDay.rdfs:label: Date value has start day

knora-api:dateValueHasStartEra.rdfs:comment: Represents the start era of a date value.
knora-api:dateValueHasStartEra.rdfs:label: Date value has start era

knora-api:dateValueHasStartMonth.rdfs:comment: Represents the start month of a date value.
knora-api:dateValueHasStartMonth.rdfs:label: Date value has start month

knora-api:dateValueHasStartYear.rdfs:comment: Represents the start year of a date value.
knora-api:dateValueHasStartYear.rdfs:label: Date value has start year

knora-api:decimalValueAsDecimal.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal decimal value of a DecimalValue.
knora-api:decimalValueAsDecimal.rdfs:label: Decimal value as decimal

knora-api:fileValueAsUrl.rdfs:comment: The URL at which the file can be accessed.
knora-api:fileValueAsUrl.rdfs:label: File value as URL

knora-api:fileValueHasFilename.rdfs:comment: The name of the file that a file value represents.
knora-api:fileValueHasFilename.rdfs:label: File value has filename

knora-api:fileValueIsPreview.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether this is file value is a preview.
knora-api:fileValueIsPreview.rdfs:label: File value is preview

knora-api:geometryValueAsGeometry.rdfs:comment: Represents a 2D geometry value as JSON.
knora-api:geometryValueAsGeometry.rdfs:label: Geometry value as JSON

knora-api:geonameValueAsGeonameCode.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal Geoname code of a GeonameValue.
knora-api:geonameValueAsGeonameCode.rdfs:label: Geoname value as Geoname code

knora-api:hasAudioFileValue.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to an audio file
knora-api:hasAudioFileValue.rdfs:label: has audio file

knora-api:hasClasses.rdfs:comment: Points to information about one or more classes
knora-api:hasClasses.rdfs:label: has classes

knora-api:hasColor.rdfs:comment: Specifies the color of a region.
knora-api:hasColor.rdfs:label: Color

knora-api:hasComment.rdfs:comment: Represents a comment on a resource as a knora-base:TextValue
knora-api:hasComment.rdfs:label: Comment

knora-api:hasDocumentFileValue.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a document
knora-api:hasDocumentFileValue.rdfs:label: has document

knora-api:hasFileValue.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a file
knora-api:hasFileValue.rdfs:label: has file

knora-api:hasIncomingLink.rdfs:comment: Indicates that this resource referred to by another resource
knora-api:hasIncomingLink.rdfs:label: has incoming links

knora-api:hasIndividuals.rdfs:comment: Points to information about one or more OWL named individuals
knora-api:hasIndividuals.rdfs:label: has individuals

knora-api:hasLinkTo.rdfs:comment: Represents a direct connection between two resources
knora-api:hasLinkTo.rdfs:label: has Link to

knora-api:hasLinkToValue.rdfs:comment: Points to a LinkValue reification describing a link between two resources
knora-api:hasLinkToValue.rdfs:label: has Link to

knora-api:hasMovingImageFileValue.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a movie file
knora-api:hasMovingImageFileValue.rdfs:label: has movie file

knora-api:hasOntologies.rdfs:comment: Points to information about one or more ontologies
knora-api:hasOntologies.rdfs:label: has ontologies

knora-api:hasProperties.rdfs:comment: Points to information about one or more properties
knora-api:hasProperties.rdfs:label: has properties

knora-api:hasRepresentation.rdfs:comment: References an instance of a Representation. A Representation contains the metadata of a digital object (= file) which represents some physical entity such as an image, a sound, an encoded text etc.
knora-api:hasRepresentation.rdfs:label: has Representation

knora-api:hasStandoffLinkTo.rdfs:comment: Represents a link in standoff markup from one resource to another.
knora-api:hasStandoffLinkTo.rdfs:label: has Standoff Link to

knora-api:hasStandoffLinkToValue.rdfs:comment: Represents a link in standoff markup from one resource to another.
knora-api:hasStandoffLinkToValue.rdfs:label: has Standoff Link to

knora-api:hasStillImageFileValue.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to an image file
knora-api:hasStillImageFileValue.rdfs:label: has image file

knora-api:hasTextFileValue.rdfs:comment: Connects a Representation to a text file
knora-api:hasTextFileValue.rdfs:label: has text file

knora-api:intValueAsInt.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal integer value of an IntValue.
knora-api:intValueAsInt.rdfs:label: Integer value as integer

knora-api:isEditable.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether a property's values can be updated via the Knora API.
knora-api:isEditable.rdfs:label: is editable

knora-api:isInherited.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether a cardinality has been inherited from a base class
knora-api:isInherited.rdfs:label: is inherited

knora-api:isLinkProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether a property points to a resource
knora-api:isLinkProperty.rdfs:label: is link property

knora-api:isLinkValueProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether a property points to a link value (reification)
knora-api:isLinkValueProperty.rdfs:label: is link value property

knora-api:isMainResource.rdfs:comment: Indicates if the given resource is the main resource of a request or a resource referred to by a link property.

knora-api:isPartOf.rdfs:comment: Indicates that this resource is part of another resource
knora-api:isPartOf.rdfs:label: is part of

knora-api:isRegionOf.rdfs:comment: Region of interest within a digital object (e.g. an image)
knora-api:isRegionOf.rdfs:label: is region of

knora-api:isRegionOfValue.rdfs:comment: Region of interest within a digital object (e.g. an image)
knora-api:isRegionOfValue.rdfs:label: is region of

knora-api:linkValueHasTarget.rdfs:comment: Represents the target resource of a link value.
knora-api:linkValueHasTarget.rdfs:label: Link value has target

knora-api:linkValueHasTargetIri.rdfs:comment: Represents the IRI of the target resource of a link value.
knora-api:linkValueHasTargetIri.rdfs:label: Link value has target IRI

knora-api:listValueAsListNode.rdfs:comment: Represents a reference to a hierarchical list node.
knora-api:listValueAsListNode.rdfs:label: Hierarchical list value as list node

knora-api:listValueAsListNodeLabel.rdfs:comment: Represents the name of the list node pointed to.
knora-api:listValueAsListNodeLabel.rdfs:label: Hierarchical list value as list node name

knora-api:movingImageFileValueHasDimX.rdfs:comment: The horizontal dimension of a moving image file value.
knora-api:movingImageFileValueHasDimX.rdfs:label: Moving image file value has X dimension

knora-api:movingImageFileValueHasDimY.rdfs:comment: The vertical dimension of a moving image file value.
knora-api:movingImageFileValueHasDimY.rdfs:label: Moving image file value has Y dimension

knora-api:movingImageFileValueHasDuratio.rdfs:comment: The duration of a moving image file value.
knora-api:movingImageFileValueHasDuratio.rdfs:label: Moving image file value has duration

knora-api:movingImageFileValueHasFps.rdfs:comment: The number of frames per second in a moving image file value.
knora-api:movingImageFileValueHasFps.rdfs:label: Moving image file value has frames per second

knora-api:movingImageFileValueHasQuality.rdfs:comment: The quality level of a moving image file value.
knora-api:movingImageFileValueHasQuality.rdfs:label: Moving image file value has quality level

knora-api:objectType.rdfs:comment: Specifies the required type of the objects of a property
knora-api:objectType.rdfs:label: Object type

knora-api:ontologyName.rdfs:comment: Represents the short name of an ontology
knora-api:ontologyName.rdfs:label: ontology name

knora-api:resourceProperty.rdfs:comment: The base property of properties that point from Knora resources to Knora resources or values. These properties are required to have cardinalities in the resource classes in which they are used.

knora-api:result.rdfs:comment: Provides a message indicating that an operation was successful
knora-api:result.rdfs:label: result

knora-api:seqnum.rdfs:comment: Indicates the position of a resource within a sequence
knora-api:seqnum.rdfs:label: Sequence number

knora-api:stillImageFileValueHasDimX.rdfs:comment: The horizontal dimension of a still image file value.
knora-api:stillImageFileValueHasDimX.rdfs:label: Still image file value has X dimension

knora-api:stillImageFileValueHasDimY.rdfs:comment: The vertical dimension of a still image file value.
knora-api:stillImageFileValueHasDimY.rdfs:label: Still image file value has Y dimension

knora-api:stillImageFileValueHasIIIFBase.rdfs:comment: The IIIF base URL of a still image file value.
knora-api:stillImageFileValueHasIIIFBase.rdfs:label: Still image file value has IIIF base URL

knora-api:subjectType.rdfs:comment: Specifies the required type of the subjects of a property
knora-api:subjectType.rdfs:label: Subject type

knora-api:textValueAsHtml.rdfs:comment: A text value represented in HTML.
knora-api:textValueAsHtml.rdfs:label: Text value as HTML

knora-api:textValueAsXml.rdfs:comment: A Text value represented in XML.
knora-api:textValueAsXml.rdfs:label: Text value as XML

knora-api:textValueHasStandoff.rdfs:comment: Standoff markup attached to a text value.
knora-api:textValueHasStandoff.rdfs:label: text value has standoff

knora-api:uriValueAsUri.rdfs:comment: Represents the literal URI value of a UriValue.
knora-api:uriValueAsUri.rdfs:label: URI value as URI

knora-api:valueAsString.rdfs:comment: A plain string representation of a value

knora-api:hasOntologies.rdfs:label: The knora-api ontology in the complex schema
